divs: Sighting Detailsknew they'd be around after seeing some on the 1st and 2nd, around 9:45 took shootnshare and camera out as soon as I went out saw 4 hovering around fire works as I was watching saw airplane it had blinking light and heard the noise. after 3 to 5 minutes the four dissapeared but From the south east saw two more heading NW continued to see two coming from the SE heading NW every few minutes about 12 in all also 2 from the south heading north (trying to download from shootnshare but having problems with it)
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Coffeyville
There were no other sightings in Coffeyville on or around July 4th 2013
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
